entry.name: simplePrintf
entry.description: This CUDA Runtime API sample is a very basic sample that implements how to use the printf function in the device code. Specifically, for devices with compute capability less than 2.0, the function cuPrintf is called; otherwise, printf can be used directly.
entry.supported-env: linux:x86_64, linux:i686, windows7, macosx:x86_64, macosx:i686, :arm, linux:aarch64
